about_the_game:
STORY

Olive is a struggling artist in her late 20s who sleeps alone at a government funded art studio that's short on supplies. Receiving a giftcard for UNLIMITED purchases at "Magi-Art" art store, how could she not chase up this opportunity?

Tricked into entering the wizard's tower, she now must fight off waves of freakazoid art monsters so she can escape and claim her prize!

GAMEPLAY

Olive's Art-Venture is a spell-slinging arena and mobbing game. Use the paper on the right side of the screen to draw shapes and cast spells, damaging enemies and protecting you. Every level introduces a new enemy as you attempt to make your way to the top floor and kick whoever's butt built this crazy place.

If she's extra efficient and collects enough coins, she'll enter FRENZY mode and be able to cast an infinite amount of spells for a short duration.

FEATURES

  • Battle through 8 Floors
  • New enemies on every floor
  • A special Boss Battle at the end
  • Takes 20-30 minutes total to playthrough
